function.name: cal_days_in_month
function.description: Return the number of days in a month for a given year and calendar.

function.name: cal_from_jd
function.description: Converts from Julian Day Count to a supported calendar.

function.name: cal_info
function.description: Returns information about a particular calendar.

function.name: cal_to_jd
function.description: Converts from a supported calendar to Julian Day Count.

function.name: easter_date
function.description: Get Unix timestamp for midnight on Easter of a given year.

function.name: easter_days
function.description: Get number of days after March 21 on which Easter falls for a given year.

function.name: FrenchToJD
function.description: Converts a date from the French Republican Calendar to a Julian Day Count.

function.name: GregorianToJD
function.description: Converts a Gregorian date to Julian Day Count.

function.name: JDDayOfWeek
function.description: Returns the day of the week.

function.name: JDToFrench
function.description: Converts a Julian Day Count to the French Republican Calendar.

function.name: JDToGregorian
function.description: Converts Julian Day Count to Gregorian date.

function.name: jdtojewish
function.description: Converts a Julian day count to a Jewish calendar date.

function.name: JDToJulian
function.description: Converts a Julian Day Count to a Julian Calendar Date.

function.name: jdtounix
function.description: Convert Julian Day to Unix timestamp.

function.name: JewishToJD
function.description: Converts a date in the Jewish Calendar to Julian Day Count.

function.name: JulianToJD
function.description: Converts a Julian Calendar date to Julian Day Count.

function.name: unixtojd
function.description: Convert Unix timestamp to Julian Day.
